name: HSC BLUE BOOT BADGE for the Quarter-Finalists 2022

metadata.name: HSC BLUE BOOT BADGE for the Quarter-Finalists 2022
metadata.description: This HYPER BLUE BOOT BADGE is awarded to the eligible holders of Hyper Football Club - World 2022 in celebration of Quarter-Finalists of the QATAR 2022 FIFA World Cup: Netherlands, Argentina, France, England, Croatia, Brazil, Morocco, Portugal.
metadata.criteria: The badge is automatically awarded to the holders of Hyper Football Club - World 2022 NFT(s) with country property of Netherlands, Argentina, France, England, Croatia, Brazil, Morocco and Portugal at the time of the last game of 2022 FIFA World Cup Round of 16.
metadata.evidence: The winner has been proved to be the holder of eligible Hyper Football Club - World 2022 NFT(s) at the time of the last game of 2022 FIFA World Cup Round of 16: Netherlands, Argentina, France, England, Croatia, Brazil, Morocco or Portugal.
